secscan.common.delete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{param}}?
secscan.common.portScanDescr: Scan hosts or subnets for open ports
secscan.common.customDescr: Define a specific scan using the NMAP command line

secscan.scanjobs.addScanJobInfoText: The security scanner app allows to "inventory" the components inside a machine by scanning its network for active hosts. Additionally it can evaluate the current security state of the found components (e.g. ports, services) and compare it against given policies. The app provides all the tools which are required for this task.
secscan.scanjobs.name: Name
secscan.scanjobs.deleteScanJob.title: Delete scan job
secscan.scanjobs.startScanConfirmation: Caution: You are about to execute an action that may have negative effects (e.g. crash) on IT end devices in the same network. Execution only with permission!
secscan.scanjobs.startScan.title: Start scan
secscan.scanjobs.stopScan.title: Stop scan
secscan.scanjobs.stopScan.confirmation: Are you sure to stop the scan '{{param}}'?

secscan.hostDiscoveryScanEditor.targetsHintScan: The targets specified above will be scanned for active hosts
secscan.hostDiscoveryScanEditor.targetsHintExclude: The targets specified above will be excluded from the host scan
secscan.hostDiscoveryScanEditor.expectedHostsHint: After the scan detected hosts will automatically be checked against the hosts specified above. Matches will be marked as passed within the report and deviations will be marked as failed.
secscan.hostDiscoveryScanEditor.defaultPolicy: Mark all other detected hosts in report as

secscan.portScanEditor.targetsHintScan: The targets specified above will be scanned for open ports

secscan.portScanEditor.modeUdpDescr: Scan specified targets for open UDP ports
secscan.portScanEditor.modeTcpUdpDescr: Scan specified targets for open TCP and UDP ports
secscan.portScanEditor.portPoliciesHint: After the scan the detected ports will automatically be checked against the port policies specified above.  Matches will be marked as passed within the report and deviations will be marked as failed.
secscan.portScanEditor.toAddPortPolicyClick: To add a port policy, click

secscan.targetsTabPage.toLoadTargetsClick: To load targets from a file, click
